item.title: sarathi
item.description: Sarathi is an LLM-based, simple command line interface-based coding assistant. ThIt ca write detailed commit messages and documentation for a python codebases here

item.title: mlopsdemo
item.description: A mini Dockerized ML system with MLOPS capabilities (train/deploy). It can train/deploy models for recommendation/classification given user+stores click interaction data set and automatically deploy models to be served by a simple python web API end point. You can find the source code of the application here
